title: RAYLEIGH JUST PULLED UP?! - One Piece Episode 507 + 508 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction and review video covering One Piece episodes 507 and 508, focusing on Rayleigh's arrival at Amazon Lily and his offer to train Luffy.

title: Rayleigh has a PLAN || One Piece Episode 506, 507 & 508 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction and review video covering One Piece episodes 506-508, including Rayleigh's plan to train Luffy.

title: DARK KING RAYLEIGH APPEARS! | One Piece Episode 507 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A couples reaction and discussion video for One Piece Episode 507, focusing on Rayleigh's appearance.

title: One Piece Episode #507 Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A written review of One Piece Episode 507 published on the same day as the episode's Japanese air date. Reviews Rayleigh's arrival and his conversation with Luffy about training.

title: Episode 507, "Gum Gum Ladysmith Black Mambazo"
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: The One Piece Podcast episode 507 discussing One Piece manga Chapter 895 (not anime episode 507). Features guests Stephen Paul, Nate Ming, Bryan Newton, and Alex Kazanas.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses manga chapter 895, contains significant spoilers

title: One Piece – Post War Arc (Episodes 493 – 516) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Post-War Arc (episodes 493-516), which includes Episode 507. Discusses the arc's themes of loss, recovery, and preparation for the future.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Post-War Arc (episodes 493-516)
